fields.headline: The measure
fields.bodyText: Going up Fendi Getting to be one of the Measure's new favourite labels Science lab glasses Very Balenciaga, very now High-street tunics Take it from us - as good as designer versions, with special shouts going out to Wallis and Toppers (naturellement) Elemis' Tri-Enzyme range Have we mentioned this before? Who cares? We'll mention it again. This stuff is grrrrr-eat! Jennifer Hudson Soon to be seen in the peerless Dreamgirls. Quite possibly our favourite actress ever (well, this week, anyway) River Island A renaissance that makes us cheer Going down Detox diets Do you really think you can get through January by eating mung beans? Give it up, people T-shirts and vests £25 - on the high street! When did this start? Dresses with Horizontal stripes A summer plague. Perfect for looking like the Stay Puft Marshmallow Man, as seen in Ghostbusters Celebrity progeny As seen, in surplus, in the new Burberry campaign. Boring! Kate Middleton gush Fine, she's a perfectly pretty girl - but fashion icon? Puh-leeze
